item.title: 瑞安航空老板因股价触及目标而有望获得 1 亿欧元薪酬
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）刚刚有资格获得 1 亿欧元（约合 1.14 亿美元）的奖金，这是近年来欧洲上市公司高管获得的最大一笔奖金。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc’s chief executive officer has just become eligible for a €100-million ($114 million) bonus, granting Michael O’Leary one of the biggest payouts among European public company executives in recent years.】

item.title: 埃默里为校园和医院项目发行 10 亿美元债券
item.description: 埃默里大学正在考虑借入超过 10 亿美元的市政债务，为其校园和医院系统的项目提供资金。【原文：Emory University is considering borrowing more than $1 billion of municipal debt to finance projects for its campus and hospital system.】

item.title: 战胜苹果后，移动游戏制造商有望获得意外之财
item.description: 由于一项法院裁决，手机游戏开发商今年可能会多获得数十亿美元的收入，使他们免受苹果公司 App Store 规定的限制。【原文：Mobile-game developers may reap billions of dollars more in revenue this year as a result of a court ruling freeing them from rules imposed by Apple Inc.’s App Store.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯申请恢复纽约天然气管道项目
item.description: 威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.）向联邦能源监管机构提出申请，要求重新启动向纽约市地区输送天然气的输气管道提案。【原文：Williams Cos. filed a petition to federal energy regulators to revive a proposal for a pipeline that would deliver natural gas to the New York City area.】

item.title: 关于出口限制的信函发出后，Synopsys 暂停发布指南
item.description: 在收到美国政府有关对华出口新限制的消息后，Synopsys 公司暂停了本季度和整个财年的财务指导。【原文：Synopsys Inc. suspended its financial guidance for the current quarter and the full fiscal year after receiving word from the US government of new restrictions on exports to China.】

item.title: Meta 与 Anduril 合作生产人工智能驱动的军用产品
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正与国防承包商 Anduril Industries 公司合作，为美国军方开发新产品，包括一款具有虚拟和增强现实功能的人工智能头盔。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is partnering with defense contractor Anduril Industries Inc. to develop new products for the US military, including an artificial intelligence-powered helmet with virtual and augmented reality features.】

item.title: 贝尔人工智能公司（Bell AI）负责人表示，数据中心的水电供应优于阿尔伯塔省的天然气供应
item.description: 石油和天然气中心阿尔伯塔省在 2024 年大肆宣传要为人工智能数据中心供电。但这并没有说服 BCE 公司，该公司正在该国建立首批大型系统之一。【原文：Oil and gas hub Alberta made a big pitch in 2024 to supply power for AI data centers. It didn’t convince BCE Inc., which is setting up one of the first major systems in the country.】

item.title: 高盛华德隆称债券交易员对债务的恐惧超过对关税的恐惧
item.description: 高盛集团总裁表示，债券交易员对美国政府债务水平不断上升越来越感到恐慌；现在，这种担忧比关税带来的风险更大。【原文：Bond traders are becoming increasingly spooked by mounting levels of US government debt — and it’s now a concern that holds more risk than tariffs, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s president.】

item.title: 美联储称鲍威尔与特朗普在白宫会面讨论经济问题
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周四在白宫会见了唐纳德-特朗普总统。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell met with President Donald Trump Thursday at the White House, the central bank said in a statement, their first such meeting since the president began his second term.】

item.title: 刚果洪水泛滥的矿山是全球铜供应面临的最新威胁
item.description: 世界上最重要的铜矿之一的地位仍笼罩在不确定的阴影中，在地震活动造成地下深处大面积洪水泛滥一周多之后。【原文：The status of one of the world’s most important copper mines remains clouded in uncertainty, more than a week after seismic activity caused widespread flooding deep below ground.】

item.title: 印度 Shapoorji 公司完成 34 亿美元创纪录私人信贷交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度房地产和建筑企业集团 Shapoorji Pallonji 集团已完成了一笔 34 亿美元的融资，这是印度有史以来最大的一笔私人信贷交易。【原文：Indian real estate and construction conglomerate Shapoorji Pallonji Group has completed a $3.4 billion financing in the country’s biggest ever private credit deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利敦促密切欧盟贸易以扭转脱欧损害
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）敦促政府与欧盟达成更深入的贸易协议，以改善经济增长并 "最大限度地减少 "英国脱欧的 "负面影响"。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey has urged the government to strike a deeper trade deal with the European Union to improve growth and “minimize negative effects” of Brexit.】

item.title: 墨西哥躲过经济衰退后，墨西哥银行将进一步降息
item.description: 在经济险些避免衰退之后，墨西哥央行预计将继续逐步放宽货币政策。【原文：Mexico’s central bank expects to continue to ease monetary policy gradually after the economy narrowly avoided recession.】

item.title: 布基纳法索将重启金矿，提高 2025 年产量
item.description: 随着毛里求斯 Soleil Resources International Ltd.的一个项目全面投产，以及澳大利亚西非资源有限公司（West African Resources Ltd.）的一个新矿在今年晚些时候开始产出，布基纳法索今年有望增加工业黄金开采量。【原文：Burkina Faso is poised to increase its industrial gold mining this year as a project by Mauritius’s Soleil Resources International Ltd. rises to full production and a new mine by Australia’s West African Resources Ltd. starts output later this year.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率第三次上升，但仍维持在 7% 以下
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第三周上升。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for a third straight week.】

item.title: 美国可能于周五将特朗普关税案提交最高法院审理
item.description: 特朗普政府表示，如果联邦上诉法院不立即搁置认定总统大部分关税非法的裁决，它将要求美国最高法院最快于周五进行干预。【原文：The Trump administration said it would ask the US Supreme Court to intervene as soon as Friday if a federal appeals court doesn’t immediately put on hold a decision finding that most of the president’s tariffs are illegal.】

item.title: 丰厚套利助长哥伦比亚比索熊市的 "痛苦交易
item.description: 油价暴跌、预算赤字不断扩大、左派领导人推动降低利率：乍一看，这是货币交易员们押注哥伦比亚的完美条件。【原文：Slumping oil prices, a widening budget deficit and a leftist leader pushing for lower interest rates: At first glance, it’s the perfect setup for currency traders to bet against Colombia.】

item.description:
与摩根大通资产管理公司邪教分析师的对话。【原文：

A chat with JPMorgan Asset Management's cult analyst.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：迈克尔-肯巴勒斯特说人工智能是本世纪的赌注（播客）
item.description: Michael Cembalest 从事投资分析近 40 年，他的研究报告在华尔街广受追捧。他以深入研究能源和医疗保健等广泛主题而闻名。最近，他撰写了大量关于人工智能的文章，尤其是他对弄清数据中心和计算方面的所有投资是否会转化为实际利润感兴趣。在本期节目中，我们将与摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Manag）的市场与投资策略主席进行对话。【原文：Michael Cembalest has been an investment analyst for almost 40 years and his research notes have drawn a cult following on Wall Street. He’s known for going super deep into a wide range of topics, like energy and healthcare. And lately he’s been writing a lot about AI, with a particular interest in figuring out whether all the investment in data centers and compute will translate into actual profits. On this episode, we talk to the chair of market and investment strategy for JPMorgan Asset Manag】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比认为关税消失将降低利率
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，贸易政策的解决可能会推动美国经济回到关税前的轨道，从而允许官员们降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said a resolution in trade policy could push the US economy back toward its pre-tariff trajectory, allowing officials to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 西班牙大停电指责游戏升温，Iberdrola 将矛头指向电网
item.description: 西班牙电网运营商和该国最大的公用事业公司就其在该国有史以来最大停电事故中所扮演的角色进行了公开指责。【原文：Spain’s grid operator and the country’s largest utility took to public finger-wagging over their roles during the country’s biggest-ever blackout.】

item.title: 进口需求激增，埃及考虑再造一艘液化天然气船
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，埃及正在考虑再增加一艘液化天然气进口船，因为这个一年前还在出口天然气的国家现在正急于锁定供应，以满足国内需求。【原文：Egypt is considering adding yet another LNG import vessel, according to people familiar with the plan, as the nation that was exporting gas just a year ago is now rushing to lock in supplies to cover domestic demand.】

item.title: 阿波罗与摩根大通、高盛合作开展私人信贷交易
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司正在与摩根大通公司、高盛集团和其他三家银行合作进行私人信贷交易，与华尔街最大的公司合作在更大范围内组建投资级债务银团。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is working with JPMorgan Chase & Co., Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and three other banks to trade private credit, partnering with Wall Street’s largest firms to syndicate investment-grade debt on a broader scale.】

item.title: 支付工人搬迁费的经济效益
item.description:
一项新的研究发现，塔尔萨用 1 万美元吸引远程工人的努力已将投资的四倍返还给当地经济。【原文：

A new study finds that Tulsa’s effort to lure remote workers with $10,000 has has returned four times that investment back into the local economy. 

】

item.title: 经济学家对哥伦比亚财政前景的担忧与日俱增
item.description: 哥伦比亚经济学家对国家的财政前景日益感到悲观，一些人预测今年将出现大流行病以来的最大赤字。【原文：Colombian economists are increasingly gloomy about the nation’s fiscal outlook, with some predicting the biggest deficit since the pandemic this year.】

item.title: 杰克-马勒斯希望在 Tether 和 Cantor 的帮助下超越迈克尔-赛勒
item.description: 直到最近，杰克-马勒斯（Jack Mallers）在核心加密货币社区之外最为人熟知的，可能就是 2021 年在迈阿密举行的加密货币行业最大会议上宣布比特币将成为萨尔瓦多的法定货币时泪流满面。【原文：Until recently, Jack Mallers was probably best known outside the hardcore crypto community for bursting into tears in 2021 while announcing that Bitcoin would be legal tender in El Salvador during the industry’s largest conference in Miami.】

item.title: 银行对私人信贷基金的贷款五年内增长 145
item.description: 华尔街银行已成为价值 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷行业最坚定的金融支持者，在过去五年中，它们向私人债务基金提供的贷款额飙升了 145%。【原文：Wall Street banks have emerged as the staunchest financial supporters of the $1.7 trillion private credit industry, with the volume of their loans to private debt funds soaring 145% over the past five years.】

item.title: 波兰天然气关税大幅下调刺激宽松利率前景
item.description: 波兰决定从 7 月起将天然气价格降低 14.8%，这对降低通胀率是个好兆头，也为央行进一步降息铺平了道路。【原文：Poland’s decision to reduce gas-price tariffs by 14.8% from July bodes well for bringing down inflation and paves way for the central bank to further cut interest rates.】
